name: Touhou Hanetsuki
description:
Don't let it fall on the ground! Make combo-moves by hitting the shuttle again and again!

** A windows build is also available. Please try it if the game runs poorly in the browser

This game imitates the single-player version of Hanetsuki (羽根突き), which is a traditional Japanese game that's similar to badminton. Use ASWD keys to move around, and press the space key to swing the bat. Hit the shuttle before it hits the ground to send it back to mid-air.

Try to make combos by hitting the shuttle again and again without a miss! 

Tip 1:  When the shuttle is hit, it moves towards the direction your character is facing. 

Tip 2: The position where the shuttle will land is marked by the white-ring on the ground. Try to stand in the ring when you swing the bat. 

Sadly, there isn't a multiplayer-version where Reimu plays against Marisa. I feel like this is what the fellows in Gensokyo would do during the new year. 

** Use of Softwares and Third-Party Assets:

  •  Chibi Basemesh by cantean123 on Sketchfab (CC License) https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/chibi-body-base-mesh-3281a1cffd804f1488b4ec0bbb6...
  • Idle and walk cycle animations from mixamo.com
  • Character modeling and animation using Autodesk Maya Student Version
  • Unity-chan toon shader: https://unity-chan.com/download/releaseNote.php?id=UTS2_0&lang=en
